# coder tokens create

Create a token

## Usage

```console
coder tokens create [flags]
```

## Flags

### --lifetime

Specify a duration for the lifetime of the token.
<br/>
| | |
| --- | --- |
| Consumes | <code>$CODER_TOKEN_LIFETIME</code> |
| Default | <code>720h0m0s</code> |

### --name, -n

Specify a human-readable name.
<br/>
| | |
| --- | --- |
